notes:
Foreman Kneebiter will disappear one hour after spawning. 
<gallery>
Foremankneebiter.jpg
</gallery>
sounds: Ashes and rust! I'll get you!
No one will steal our ore!
name: Foreman Kneebiter
behaviour: Foreman Kneebiter chases the opponent until death.
strategy:
'''[[Knight]]s''': Knights should have good skills like 75/75. But it is recommended to have 80/80. Of course you don't know when you will meet him so you may die because of bad skills and a low amount of supplies. However a backpack of health potions should be enough. If you are [[Premium Account|Premium]] you should use [[Berserk]]-like [[Spells]] too.
'''[[Sorcerer]]s''', the best way is to simply run using your best wand while shooting strike [[Spells]] like [[Death Strike]] if you are [[Premium Account|Premium]]. If you are non-premium you should still use your best wand and run. Using [[Fireball]] runes instead of [[Flame Strike]]/[[Death Strike]] is a good idea too. Just keep distance.
'''[[Druid]]s''' should use their best rods like a [[Underworld Rod]] or a [[Hailstorm Rod]] combined with [[Flame Strike]]/[[Death Strike]].  If you are non-premium, use [[Fireball]] runes.
[[Mage]]s can shoot [[Sudden Death]] runes. It's easier and faster.
'''[[Paladin]]s''' need good skills. Use royal spears combined with either [[Ethereal Spear]] or [[Fireball]] runes.
